text.section: Before an organization listed in subsection (b) of this section may operate a gaming event or casino event, the organization shall obtain a permit from the Department of Permits and Development Management.

section.section: A permit to conduct a gaming event or casino event shall provide that only the members of the permit holder may manage the gaming event or casino event.

Except as provided in § 13-604 of this subtitle, a person may not:
operate a card game, a dice game, or roulette; or
conduct a casino event.

An organization that obtains a permit shall ensure that:
an individual or group of individuals does not benefit financially from the holding of the gaming event;
an individual or group of individuals does not receive any of the proceeds of the gaming event for personal use or benefit; and
the gaming event is managed personally by the members of the permit holder.
